snippet: The Anne Frank House museum in Amsterdam said that toys given by Anne Frank to a non-Jewish friend shortly before she and her family went into hiding from the Nazis have been recovered.
abstract: Anne Frank House museum in Amsterdam says toys given by Anne Frank to non-Jewish friend shortly before she and her family went into hiding from the Nazis have been recovered.
lead_paragraph: The Anne Frank House museum in Amsterdam said that toys given by Anne Frank to a non-Jewish friend shortly before she and her family went into hiding from the Nazis have been recovered.

headline.main: The Netherlands: Anne Frank Toy Found
